source_comments: February. I'm fuckd

I just kept loving the orange on the side everytime I saw it and got "tired" of the blue. Soon as I decided I'd eventually buy a N, the color plan was also sinked in.

Unreal tournament  3. It got burned into my old plasma tv xD
F4 not a single hésitation

Blade no questions asked.

I highly recommend Agents of S.h.i.e.l.d

New mutants wasnt a bad watch and had some interesting stuff, but his ultimately of no consequence in the grand scheme of things
Yeah no, Chao gpt hurts the environnement more than that 17mpg does. I found my answer anyways, 6.1L/ 100km which is only slightly worst that what I do on my 2021 non-N elantra. Pretty impressive
Understandable, but it's because we dont get many good things as gamers in the last few years. When something spécial comes out, ppl get thrilled. That's what this is
But it's still missable if platinum hunting is your thing . Him restating that is correct
It's everything BUT overrated. And I still haven't found a single person that said it's bad, overrated, not worth it etc. That just didn't completely suck with the battle system😆😆😆🫠

Parry is optimal but if its too hard, dodge is just as good. There is one very specific side boss fight after act 2 that requires dodging for 2 out of the 3 enemies in front of you, Parry won't work (at least not from my 10/15 tries at it, switching to full dodge won me the fight in try # 2)

The honest "cons". 
1) Parry can be difficult and some fights will require a few restarts (that is a plus for me personnally😉)

2)You might often find some invisible walls where you felt you could go explore. I found them to be helpful to keep à sense of direction without à minimap, but others could complain about this and nobody could say it's wrong.

 3) Lack of minimap. Again depends on who you are as a gamer. For me it was a 100% pro since it favorised immersion and wonder, but it's something not for everyone.

4) fights might become a bit repetitive if you feel the need to grind. However, the variety of enemies is still large and boring fights can be beaten in seconds with proper builds (instadeath cannon being one of the most amazingly fun thing you find towards the later part of the game xD it's not named that, but you will understand)

5) while the music is god tier, it's sometimes looping on repetitively. This annoyed me exactly twice in 64 hours.

6) some people have complained about the UI for pictos and lumen. I'd say this is the game weakest aspect indeed. Thankfully, it's not confusing and you can ignore it pretty quickly if you just gear up/ weapon change/ adjust while in camping.
They could try but shouldnt be allowed too. I'm curious to know for sure too
